subject: Football
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Yale is 4-0 entering Saturday’s home game against Lehigh, and junior Mike McLeod has been almost unstoppable, amassing 719 yards and 13 touchdowns.
snippet: Yale is 4-0 entering Saturday’s home game against Lehigh, and junior Mike McLeod has been almost unstoppable, amassing 719 yards and 13 touchdowns.
